text: Nice and friendly chap who looks after the place. Has most of the things you need at the last minute within walking distance. Prices are reasonable, too. Go to place groceries.

I find the Store Manager (Mr Andrew) very helpful and quick in his service to the customers. When I took my school children for a learning trip to the mini mart he was friendly and welcoming. It is wonderful to have such a person like Mr Andrew who is polite and cheerful. Thank you Mr Andrew.

Ok near the blocks everything is available but very congested the shop n smelly may be less space more products or goods
But ok for emergency purpose can walkin n get the required house hold items when nothing available
Its like neighbourhood mart with all important house hold items
Will share photos soon

I have no complaints when the incharge was a chinese man, in his 50s. He was friendly and helpful. I always can get what i want, never out of stock. Is a pity that he has left. Currently, the minimart is no longer as good as before. There are many times which i cant get what i want. Is either no stock or stock has not arrived yet. Plsssssssss, do look into this as it is causing lots of inconvenience to the residents here.
